text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea palembanica (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Light Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea palembanica". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33621A9798146. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33621A9798146.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
